title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Experiential Communication Program for Foreign Language Technology Utilization in Science Sector Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level foreign language proficiency and job-related knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Enhance ability to deliver foreign language presentations and negotiations in scientific contexts using specialized terminology

Learners can collect and analyze peer/customer feedback at least twice a month over six months using wikis (Notion, Confluence) and videos (Loom, Vimeo), applying a three-stage improvement process (problem diagnosis → action plan development → results sharing) to enhance work efficiency by over 20%.
Successful execution of group discussion and decision-making scenarios through strategic interaction techniques at over 80%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
